moves.name: Arm Thrust
moves.description: The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Bullet Seed
moves.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Horn Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

moves.name: Chip Away
moves.description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Megahorn
moves.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
